product_name: Organic India Tulsi Green Tea Lemon Ginger 25 TB: Amazon.in: Grocery & Gourmet Foods

reviews.review_body: This green tea is so tasty, and not like those other bitter tasting green teas. It has a nice aroma of ginger too. One more plus point this has that , the tea bags are staple free, which don't cause any harm to our health. From Jan 2018, FSSAI  has banned staple pins on tea bags, but there are companies still manufacturing tea bags with stapler pins. Use of staple pins in tea bags poses potential hazard to consumers since any loose staple pin consumed inadvertently with tea may cause serious health hazard.

reviews.review_title: Good flavor, albeit artificial. But good.
reviews.review_body: Tastes great, but man.... don't drink before bed. Couldn't sleep for 3 hours past bedtime.

reviews.review_title: Healthy beverage | Refreshing and Aromatic | Healthy brew
reviews.review_body: The packaging is good. Come in tea bags which is not messy while consuming and storing.I wasn't a huge fan of green tea because of the bitter taste it has. However, after trying Organic India's Tulsi Green Tea, I developed a taste for it. Packed with antioxidants, Tulsi green tea helps your body in a lot of ways. From anti-aging to stronger immunity, green tea does it all. Does not taste bitter, so one can have it twice a day. Mixing honey in it is even more beneficial !!

This is my second review at Amazon after Syclo front load washing powder.I have tasted many green teas till date but Organic India Tulsi Green Tea, Lemon Ginger stands outstanding among all of them.It doesn't taste as green tea but it tastes more of ginger and lemon tea which will not stop you from drinking regularly. Along with this, Tulsi, Ginger, Lemon are the essentials for our body resistance and cleansing. A combination with Green tea, it makes the ulitmate. I have started this 3 months back, now my parents, inlaws and myself are having it daily.I am slowly observing that I am losing the extra fat near my belly :). I am having it in the early morning after brush. I have also subscribed monthly 2 packets for me and my parents. Can't get out of this product.Great!!!!. Thanks, Sharat Salaka

Really tasty and you can taste the ginger in it. No green tea tastes as good as this one.

I feel sick after drinking this.It can't be a coincidence that most masala tea products available in the market(not just online, but local markets) have no ginger in them, and ginger tea is often made separately without mixing other spices.I suppose the reason I feel bad after drinking this is because ginger is mixed with other spices; I could be wrong though.

I was having other brands of green tea and used to feel a little discomfort in the stomach. So wanted to give it a shot for the organic tea.I am not sure if it is purely organic but I no longer feel the discomfort. And the taste is amazing. I was hesitant initially about the tulsi mix but it is wonderfully blended and now I like drinking green tea.Lemon and ginger in specific adds more taste.
